analysis.key_quote: This feels unlawful and will not help establish any kind of a workforce. There will be a massive brain drain and no one will be there long enough to truly learn the systems, data, and processes.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses concerns about the legality and potential negative impact on the workforce, indicating a belief in the importance of a stable, knowledgeable civil service, which opposes the proposed rule's intent to politicize and destabilize the workforce.
